mapper.insert: select uuid() insert into tp_practice_library (id,question,gradeName,subjectName,rights,type,createId,createTime) values (#{id},#{question},#{gradeName},#{subjectName},#{rights},#{type},#{createId},#{createTime})
mapper.update:
update tp_practice_library
id = #{id},
question = #{question},
gradeName = #{gradeName},
subjectName = #{subjsubjectNameectname},
rights = #{rights},
type = #{type},
createId = #{createId},
createTime = #{createTime}
where id = #{id}

update tp_practice_library set id = #{id}, question = #{question}, gradeName = #{gradeName}, subjectName = #{subjectName}, rights = #{rights}, type = #{type}, createId = #{createId}, createTime = #{createTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select sd.`value` as gradeName, u.nickName as createId, t.id,t.question,t.subjectName,t.rights,t.type,t.createTime from tp_practice_library t left join sys_dict sd on sd.id= t.gradeName and sd.keyname ='G' left join `user` u on u.id = t.createId
and t.question like concat('%',#{searchQuestion},'%')
